default.text: I feel like having another beer. Please bring along a beer for your party queen.
Oh, great idea. Add one for me, please.
It shall be an honor for me to serve you some beer.
<Karl leaves and returns a few minutes later...>
I'm very sorry, but I have to make you aware of the fact, that there is no more beer available.
Oh Karl, please don't joke on us.
Dude, that can't be true. I carried like tons of beer . You just lost your glasses again, ain't ya?
Nah, don't be mean now, sweety. Just bring me a beer, would you?
Yeah, Karl got his strengths hidden deep inside. I'll help you on this one, mate. Come with me!
<Jakob and Karl leave to look for beer...>
F***, he's be f***ing serious?!
Damn, this party is over now :(
Just like I told you... it's logical, but in fact very disapointing.
What...
...now?
What do we do now?
Oh beer... I like beer... too...

fridge.text: The fridge, we took all the beers. until there had been non left.
No, I'm sure I put some more in there earlier. To keep them as cool as I am.
Oh boys, just have a look and bring me my beer!
<Jakob and Karl leave once again together to look for beer - again.>
There is really none left. Guess I drunk too many of those, sorry dudes!
Just like I said. Not a single one left.

basement.text: There is always some beer in each basement. We just need to look for it.
<Our dudes make their way to the basement. It's quite dark down there.>
Zoe, the basement is down here. Come with us.
I cannot imagine to have beer in my basement.
There has to be beer. You are just to dump to find it.
Oh, I found something very interesting...
<Nobody values Karl's valuable discovery. They all just look for beer, like Karl.>
I feel so lonely... where are my dudes?

tracyRunCircle.text: <Tracy runs in circles. In several circles.>
<She is still running. Nothing else happens meanwhile.>

gasStation.text: Follow me, dudes! I know where to go for the gas station.

karlsChamber.text: You are all welcome. Let's go!

dialogZoeHungry.text: Who cares about food? We need beer!
You got munchies again, we know that already.
She told us this exactly five times already.

choices.text: In the fridge is always beer. Let's have a look!
I put all the beer crates in the basement, we should start there.
I've seen a bottle falling down and rolling below the sofa. With enough skill we must be able to rescue it.
Some bottle fell off... lick off those drops...
We should check the beer crate in the kitchen once more for full bottles.
I know my neighbors well. We can easily ask them for some beer.
<Panic and go wild, running in a circle>
I know a buddy from the gas station. He has to help us out!
I am pretty asure of the fact that there remain all sorts of liquors at my chamber. I invite you all to join me.
